title: Question:
author: fortunecrypto
content: Gambling gave us a lot of mixed feelings and emotions after we play,  - we feel excited when we make a profit - entertained when we never expect or lose or win and gave us entertaining results,  - depressed when we expect or our goal to play is to win and we have a strategy to do that but we failed and lose our money  - Feel sorry when we already win a jackpot but decided to extend and continue playing thinking that its' our lucky day but    eventually, lose everything. - Excited to come back because you want to get the roller coaster ride of winning and losing.   What Is Your General Feeling After Playing In Casino In the last 10 sessions?

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on August 12, 2022, 06:43:56 AMGambling gave us a lot of mixed feelings and emotions after we play,  - we feel excited when we make a profit - entertained when we never expect or lose or win and gave us entertaining results,  - depressed when we expect or our goal to play is to win and we have a strategy to do that but we failed and lose our money  - Feel sorry when we already win a jackpot but decided to extend and continue playing thinking that its' our lucky day but    eventually, lose everything. - Excited to come back because you want to get the roller coaster ride of winning and losing.   What Is Your General Feeling After Playing In Casino In the last 10 sessions?The final 10th session was yesterday night for me,after winning 4 out of my 5 sports bet I decided to play one of my favorite slot machines The Green Knight from Play n Go and I won 200% of my amount,I played from 21.45 to 23.59 with bets ranging from 0.10 to 0.40 max (which I should not do,keep playing with the lowest bet will make the algorithm of the game behave differently-this is a superstition of mine although I am not superstitious) and I won really slow so in the end I came out with the first feeling,excited to finally have made a profit although not as big as I planned.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: I'm always excited to come back after my sessions and the majority of my sessions are like that I experienced winning in my first minutes then losing everything then regaining half of my wager then losing it all, the feeling of enjoyment is like a roller coaster ride you win you want to quit but you want to continue the excitement, I'm just glad that I'm using money that I'm comfortable losing, which should always be the case.

comments.author: Boristhecat
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on August 12, 2022, 06:43:56 AMGambling gave us a lot of mixed feelings and emotions after we play,  - we feel excited when we make a profit - entertained when we never expect or lose or win and gave us entertaining results,  - depressed when we expect or our goal to play is to win and we have a strategy to do that but we failed and lose our money  - Feel sorry when we already win a jackpot but decided to extend and continue playing thinking that its' our lucky day but    eventually, lose everything. - Excited to come back because you want to get the roller coaster ride of winning and losing.   What Is Your General Feeling After Playing In Casino In the last 10 sessions?I am very careful about gambling, as I am afraid of the possibility of becoming an addicted player (I have seen examples of people with whom this happened). Therefore, I prefer sports betting, and in general, I do not make it in order to earn money, but in order to add emotions when watching the game. The last time I bet on the game Real - Eintracht, but the game was so one-sided that I did not even have time to get nervous about my win.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: I generally feel a sense of contentment and I'm entertained every single time. I don't gamble for a profit, I gamble to kill the hours ahead of me since I don't have anything else to do in the weekends anyway. The entertainment it gives me for a few hours is enough for me to forget about it for the whole week until I remember that I need to do something on the weekends. For sports betting that is a different thing. It always gives me something to look forward to especially if the sport/game that I'm watching is one that I've been following for a long time.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: I just want to be entertained I experienced my lowest esteem in trying to capture or regain my previous losses I'm past that stage I just want to play at the right time and at my convenience with money that I can afford to lose, the casino you're playing would like you to be like that received a good feeling and be entertained, although there is always temptation to wage more and extend your playing time but it challenged your maturity in gambling.

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: I have played for more than 10 session on this month but the feeling I've felt on my last gambling session was Excitement. It is mainly because I've won on my last gambling session and have experienced winning streak on my dice game. However, I've voted for "Entertainment" due to the fact that my feelings often change per session depending if I won or lose or even won a huge amount but end up losing everything. I always gets entertained on most of my gambling activities either I win or not.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Winning is a major key that triggers us to continuous playing after the final 10th session it was like no lose should come though i experienced little challenge but i make a replay to cover up my lapses since it was for entertainment and for fun purpose i never applied much feeling, affection.

comments.author: Rufsilf
comments.body: Well, just a little bit excited and nervous about the possible outcomes during the comeback. It is actually a mixed emotion but as a gambler, I already know that gambling isn't for making money but just a sort of entertainment and pleasure. As I come into gambling again, I know already how to control my addiction, I can manage to keep my emotions and not get angry when I lose, unlike in the old days.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I think you need to add nothing happens At least that's how I feel after playing at the casino in the last few sessions. I don't feel like that in that choice and tend to be nothing happen because I'm not after anything in gambling. I just want to play gambling without any reason so whatever the result, I don't think about it.Maybe some will be excited to come back again on another occasion because they find fun in playing gambling.

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: I gamble for fun and i enjoy it so i feel as Entertained when i plying in casino in the last 10 session. winning or loss it is doesn’t matter for me . i just enjoy my free time by gambling. And the rest of the money which money I don't need for my daily expenses, I spend on gambling. And through this I enjoy temporary happiness.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on August 12, 2022, 06:43:56 AMWhat Is Your General Feeling After Playing In Casino In the last 10 sessions?Just the same as what you have listed, I feel depressed when I lost money to gambling and I am very excited when I win, but that was before when I put all my money into gambling. Unlike now that it is fun, though I am not happy if I lose, but I am neither sad too and not depressed at all, I still have a good feeling.Quote from: Adbitco on August 12, 2022, 09:42:18 AMWinning is a major key that triggers us to continuous playing after the final 10th session it was like no lose should come though i experienced little challenge but i make a replay to cover up my lapses since it was for entertainment and for fun purpose i never applied much feeling, affection.Winning can trigger a lot of people to continue gambling, but the experienced people are not affected by both, also experienced people would win more than lose too as they are facing the reality of gambling than people that gambles often all day.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on August 12, 2022, 06:43:56 AMWhat Is Your General Feeling After Playing In Casino In the last 10 sessions?Started picking up on slots and have been playing although not still very regularly. In my last 10 sessions, I won something good just once but I didn't feel sad that I had lost more money by loosing more times than I won, I wasn't happy about it either, I just had the feeling of entertainment, after all that was my motivation and purpose for playing in the casino in the first place. Say my motivation had been solely to make money, I definitely would have been sad, possibly depressed. Plus I played with an amount that I could afford to loose and could spare for entertainment so it didn't get to me much.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Something that are bothering me lately is the "depressed" feeling I get when I win something big. You expect that you should be very happy and relieved when you win something big, after you grinded for weeks for that win, but when you get that win, you feel "empty". I think the RTP on most casinos are so bad lately, that the period between big wins are so long, that people start to feel "cheated" and "disappointed" when they eventually win something. (If I gambled and lost say $5000 over 7 days and then win $1000... that win will actually feel like a $4000 loss)

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Mostly entertained. Sure I do feel sad when I lose money and I feel happy when I win, but I pretty much leave those feelings behind whenever I stop gambling. Win or lose, it's just a matter of me trying to enjoy the process. I do sometimes extend my sessions depending on what I generally feel though, like if I'm feeling pretty excited after I was supposed to end, I'd probably add a few more minutes into my game till I lose that excitement. I generally don't want to put my excitement out there while I finish gambling already since expectations may build up, so I just release it there and then.

comments.author: rojan
comments.body: Quote from: smartaction on August 12, 2022, 10:22:01 AMI gamble for fun and i enjoy it so i feel as Entertained when i plying in casino in the last 10 session. winning or loss it is doesn’t matter for me . i just enjoy my free time by gambling. And the rest of the money which money I don't need for my daily expenses, I spend on gambling. And through this I enjoy temporary happiness.I think that gambling is not good.  After that many people gamble but there are some rules in gambling if one gambles regularly then he will not be able to improve in his life.  And if one gambles for pleasure then there will be no problem.  I don't know if anything will happen but I think it is better to refrain from it but I also gamble as a hobby.  But till today I have never been able to make such a profit, I have always lost

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Just the same as what you have describe, if I win, then definitely I'm happy with it and maybe goes on the next session. But if I lose, then, depression sets in, regrets. But nevertheless, have some fun and at the end of the day, I can still sleep.Unless the can't afford that money that you lost in gambling, then that's where the problem will arise.But for the majority of those who have control and only play with chance money then it will be fine.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: My general feeling is a comeback after losing multiple bets in a row, mostly I stop to play after I hit a good multiplier, so it will cover the previous bet I'm losing. I feel excited when a comeback happen, that's the part where I view gambling is for fun. It's not only on gambling, but in sports, video games etc an epic comeback is the most interesting part. Feeling depressed isn't good, because gambling shouldn't make you sad.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: I think all the feeling is just based on the result.If lose you're mad & depresion, If you win from gambling then you're happy but with some additional (Gonna to comeback again). Always like that, because gambler always give the money back he was winning from casino to the casino again.That's why, If you win a lot money : GO BUY SOME PHYSICAL STUFF (Trust me is work all-the time).

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: When I play in a casino and continue to lose, maybe for like 5 consecutive times, I tend to stick with the option I've been at, making similar pattern of stakes believing that, if it didn't have previous occurances, the next present one or next one would be the one. The next you know, you find me making the same stake on the same option, hoping for the multiplier to com through wth some recovery on lost bets and most times, its never the case. I get to loose even more but the good news has always been, I never get to increase my stakes with hopes of recovery and each time, I gamble only what I could afford to spare and nothing more. Once it's done, I am done.I never get to be so pained on what the occurance at the days end or session might be, just a little fun and hurt mixed.
